0.0.5.en:
Limited size of log.
Results of device search now added to 'Detected' tab of app configuration.
Fixed Contact Sensor problem

0.0.8.en:
Fixed premature exit from capability processing loop if an error occurs
Added set functions for temperature, mode and optional mode
Fixed name error in capability lookup table (WIP)

0.0.9.en: Added more AC controls and flow cards (WIP)

0.0.14.en: Added energy meter and motion sensor

0.0.15.en: Split SmartThings Components into separate devices (WIP)

0.0.16.en: Added an option to send commands to SmartThings for diagnostics use (WIP)

0.0.17.en:
Added support for blinds.
Fixed issue with saving the Bearer Token so a restart is no longer required.
Re-enabled option to add multiple device at the same time.

0.0.19.en: Added new driver for refrigeration as it is too complex for a generic approach.

0.0.20.en: Change class name from TV to tv.

0.0.21.en: Fixed Volume up button and suppressed warning messages in the log about write only capabilities.
